title: I need property records in Wilmington NC that are recorded in something called: Lands and Dowers Book A (transactions in 1965). How can I find this on line?
text:
You can find online information from the Register of Deeds and county
tax offices at the New Hanover County
website:http://www.nhcgov.com/Pages/NHC.aspx

Here's a link to another answer that might help:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4102
